column2:
"With Harriet installed as ruler, peace and stability
were returning to the Kingdom of Cuent."

"However, Harriet's mission went beyond
merely stabilizing her own country."

"The newly-restored Cuent prepared to
make its move to eliminate the
all-consuming seedless flower, Ephimera."
"First, let us establish what we know about our neighboring nations. Varuna, if you would."

"This continent is roughly divided into East, West, North
and South, each of which is occupied by one of four nations."

"To the East lies the Es-Ars Federation.
This nation was founded by merchants, who trade
their land's bountiful resources for profit."

"They specialize in the arcane art of proliferation.
Reportedly, they are able to use the power of Ephimera
to multiply their crops and produce, among other things."

"At first glance, it seems peaceful enough.
However, they are still using Ephimera, so there
is likely something sinister lurking below the surface."

"To the West is the Holy Kingdom of Epic.
This kingdom was established at an oasis,
where those who sought ascetic practices gathered."

"According to rumor, they have succeeded in
refining a potion that can control hearts and minds.
Using Ephimera, no doubt."

"In the North, the Verunian Empire.
They are a warrior nation, who choose the strongest
warrior of the previous generation to be their Emperor."

"It is a land of barbarians and idiots.
They have found a way to
augment their bodies demonically."

"Which leaves ourselves, the Magic
Kingdom of Cuent, in the south.
Our focus is on applying Mana throughout nature."

"This nation made great progress
through its magical research.
The Devil Castle that I developed
was once unique to Cuent."

"Of course, a certain someone leaked the
technology, and all four nations now possess it."
"With the help of the Guardian, Cuent's Devil Castles are being wiped out one by one."
"However, each nation controls their own Devil Castles. These are still standing, including those along the borders."
"With the Devil Castles in stalemate, diplomatic relations between the nations have entirely broken down."
"At present, we have no idea as to the state of affairs within the other nations."
"Whenever someone attempts to cross over uninvited, a Devil Castle activates and takes action to repel the intruders."
"Well, I'm sure that none are stupid enough to attempt such a thing."
"I have a report! A Devil Castle has activated on our border with Verun! Something is coming our way!"
"...So, there are still some stupid enough to attempt such a thing."
"It may be an emissary from Verun. We must hurry to the border!"
"The Doomed Kingdom"
"Soldier"
